lan_ip.note: Note: The starting IP address and ending IP address must be between 2~254, and the ending address should be greater than starting address.
lan_ip.change_to: The router's IP address is successfully changed to
lan_ip.redirect_to: You are being redirected to the new IP
lan_ip.guest_conflict_tips: It is in conflict with Guest IP
lan_ip.lan_conflict_tips: It is in conflict with LAN IP
lan_ip.ip_outside_tips: IP address is outside the subnet
lan_ip.cannot_contain_ip_tips: The address range can't include the router's IP
lan_ip.end_smaller_tips: End address is less than start address

address_reservation.title: Address Reservation
address_reservation.tips: When you specify a reserved IP address for a client within the LAN, the client always receives the same IP address each time it accesses the routerâ€™s DHCP server. You can assign reserved IP addresses to computers or servers that require permanent IP settings.
address_reservation.note: Note: Configured clients have to reconnect the router to activate.
address_reservation.name: Name
address_reservation.confirm_delete_all: Are you sure you want to delete all address reserved entries?
address_reservation.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the address reserved entry?
